name: pimatic-customcss
description: A pimatic plugin to add custom css to the mobile frontend to give pimatic your private touch
readme: pimatic-customcss ======================= This is a little helper plugin for the technically savvy user, it is not recommendet for DAU users. Its a wrapper that enables the user to load his own custom css into the pimatic-mobile-frontend. After the first restart of pimatic you find a css file in the plugin directore where you can add your custom css. See "Usage" for the detailed usage of the plugin. ### Sponsoring Do you like this plugin? Then please consider a donation to support the development. Information --------- Because of the support ending for pimatic 0.8.x, we from now on support only pimatic > 0.9.x ! Usage --------- Changelog --------------- ToDo ---------------
